title: Rare myocarditis after COVID shots: Study rules out some common culprits
description: Researchers ruled out overexuberant antibodies in an autoimmune response.

title: “Sleep language” could enable communication during lucid dreams
description: Small muscle twitches could be the key to communicating during someone's REM sleep.

title: AI with a moral compass? Anthropic outlines “Constitutional AI” in its Claude chatbot
description: List of guiding AI values draws on UN Declaration of Rights—and Apple's terms of service

title: SBF says “dishonesty and unfair dealing” aren’t fraud, seeks to dismiss charges
description: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried prepares to "clear his name."

title: Amazon will stop hogging all its original series and movies
description: That includes the 20,000-plus movies and shows it bought through MGM.

title: Researchers craft a fully edible battery
description: It has a terrible capacity but shows we don't need to use toxic materials.

title: Doom II RPG is what it says on the label, and it’s ready for PC 13 years later
description: Chainsaw an imp on your Sony Ericsson? Sure, just take it turn by turn.

title: Porsche to use Mobileye’s “SuperVision” system in future cars
description: The sensor suite includes cameras, radar, and a driver-monitoring system.

title: Apple brings Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro to iPad as $50-per-year subscriptions
description: Logic Pro will run on A12 or newer chips, while Final Cut requires an M1 or M2.

title: Spotify ejects thousands of AI-made songs in purge of fake streams
description: Platform cracks down on bots posing as listeners as flood of content rattles music industry.

title: Ambitious Arab mission to explore seven asteroids, including a very red one
description: The mission could uncover secrets about objects beyond Neptune.

title: Feds seize 13 more DDoS-for-hire platforms in ongoing international crackdown
description: The DDoS whack-a-mole game between law enforcement and miscreants continues.
